form.title: Subscription form
form.description: Integrate your forms very easily: Log in to Doppler and go to Lists > Forms > Create Form. Choose the Pop-up format, design it and publish it. Click on “Copy code”, paste it below, select “Enable Form” and click on “Save”.

scriptEnabled.title: Enable On-Site Tracking
scriptEnabled.description: Use the Tracking on-site to understand your visitors' behavior while navigating your website and know the navigation and program personalized emails based on that.
